headline: Huntsman Announces Retirement of David Stryker and Appoints Julia Wright as Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
summary: Huntsman Corporation (NYSE: HUN) announced today that Julia Wright will join Huntsman as Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary effective on October 13, 2025. Ms. Wright will succeed Huntsman's current General Counsel, David Stryker, who has announced his retirement effective at the end of the year. Mr. Stryker will move into the Chairman's Office to serve as Executive Vice President, Strategic Initiatives, pending his retirement.

headline: US oil giant ConocoPhillips will lay off up to 25% of its global workforce
summary: The U.S. oil giant announced layoffs as crude futures prices have decreased by about 11% this year.
